div.p: This case-sensitive code system https://voicecollab.ai/fhir/CodeSystem/permission-to-share-with-family defines the following codes:

tr.td: I give permission to share my medical, family history and genomic sequencing test results with a designated family member.
I do not give permission to share my medical, family history and genomic sequencing test results with a designated family member.

description.value: The codes required for neuro consent

display.value: I give permission to share my medical, family history and genomic sequencing test results with a designated family member.
I do not give permission to share my medical, family history and genomic sequencing test results with a designated family member.
